subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: For the first time since 1938, there will be no Australian men in the second round. But Rafael Nadal, Petra Kvitova, Serena Williams and Mardy Fish were winners on Day 2.
snippet: For the first time since 1938, there will be no Australian men in the second round. But Rafael Nadal, Petra Kvitova, Serena Williams and Mardy Fish were winners on Day 2.
